Package com.jfcbuilder.builders

Class OhlcPlotBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jfcbuilder.builders.OhlcPlotBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IXYPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>
    public class OhlcPlotBuilder
extends Object
implements IXYPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>
    Builder for producing stock market Open High Low Close (OHLC) plots using configured builder properties, series, and datasets.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      OhlcPlotBuilder annotation​(IXYAnnotationBuilder<?> annotation)
      Registers an IXYAnnotationBuilder whose build() method will be called to generate its XYAnnotation when this plot builder's build() method is called.
      OhlcPlotBuilder axisColor​(Paint color)
      Sets the axis color to use when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder axisFontColor​(Paint color)
      Sets the axis font color to use when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder backgroundColor​(Paint color)
      Sets the plot background color to use when building the plot.
      org.jfree.chart.plot.XYPlot build()
      Builds the DOHLC plot.
      static OhlcPlotBuilder get()
      Factory method for obtaining new instances of this class.
      OhlcPlotBuilder gridLines()
      Sets displaying grid lines ON.
      OhlcPlotBuilder indexRange​(ZeroBasedIndexRange indexRange)
      Sets the zero-based index range used to index into all source data for building the XYPlot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder line​(LineBuilder line)
      Registers a LineBuilder whose build() method will be called to generate its plot line when this plot builder'sbuild() method is called.
      OhlcPlotBuilder noGridLines()
      Sets displaying grid lines OFF.
      int plotWeight()
      Gets the currently configured plot weight.
      OhlcPlotBuilder plotWeight​(int weight)
      Sets the plot weight to be attributed to the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder series​(IXYDatasetBuilder<?> dataset)
      Same as interface IXYPlotBuilder<?>.series(IXYDatasetBuilder<?>) but also checks that only one OhlcSeriesBuilder is ever added because only one is allowed per plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder series​(IXYTimeSeriesBuilder<?> series)
      Registers an IXYTimeSeriesBuilder whose build() method will be called to generate its XYTimeSeries when this plot builder's build() method is called.
      OhlcPlotBuilder timeData​(long[] timeData)
      Sets the date-time values to be used when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder xAxis​(org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis xAxis)
      Sets the x-axis used when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder yAxisName​(String name)
      Sets the plot's y-axis name.
      OhlcPlotBuilder yAxisRange​(double lower, double upper)
      Sets an explicit y-axis value range to use instead of having the y-axis auto-calculate it.
      OhlcPlotBuilder yAxisTickSize​(double size)
      Sets the plot's y-axis tick size.
      OhlcPlotBuilder yTickFormat​(NumberFormat format)
      Sets the plot's y-axis tick format.

      • indexRange

        public OhlcPlotBuilder indexRange​(ZeroBasedIndexRange indexRange)
        Description copied from interface: IXYPlotBuilder
        Sets the zero-based index range used to index into all source data for building the XYPlot. This is an optimization to allow clients to supply existing data without having to copy and/or crop it to match the desired size axis range in the chart.
        Specified by:
        indexRange in interface IXYPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>
        Parameters:
        indexRange - The index range to be set
        Returns:
        Reference to this builder instance for method chaining

      • series

        public OhlcPlotBuilder series​(IXYDatasetBuilder<?> dataset)
        Same as interface IXYPlotBuilder<?>.series(IXYDatasetBuilder<?>) but also checks that only one OhlcSeriesBuilder is ever added because only one is allowed per plot.
        Specified by:

        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If an OhlcSeriesBuilder was already added.

        public OhlcPlotBuilder plotWeight​(int weight)

                                  double upper)
                           throws IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: IXYPlotBuilder

        upper - The upper bound to be set

        Reference to this builder instance for method chaining
        Throws:

      • build

        public org.jfree.chart.plot.XYPlot build()
                                  throws IllegalStateException
        Builds the DOHLC plot. The DOHLC series is shown behind all other series that were added.
        Specified by:
        build in interface IXYPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>
        Returns:
        New instance of an plot corresponding to all configured data sets and settings
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If an OhlcSeriesBuilder, if time axis was not set, or if time data was not set.
